++ Object Device Amplifier Electronic Pre Amplifier


+++ SUMMARY

ObjectDeviceAmplifierElectronic

converts weak signal into output signal strong enough for:
  noise tolerance
  "readability" for further processing
  
Without a pre-amplifier, audio output would be distored, noisy.

Typically placed close to the input source to avoid noise, interference.
